young scooter: i got some niggas down the road and they aint comin home i think about them everyday im gettin my hustle on but talk to them every day they got cellphones realness behind the wall gettin they juug on put yourself in my shoes you probably wouldnt survive i thank god every day i open up my eyes another thanks to my lawyer i escaped a dime any charge i ever had i took that shit to trial dont get caught with that cocaine gotta be smart in the dope game the world is full of snitches i hope i never go to prison
kevin gates: i send this out to my soldiers up the road again still breathin probably never comin home again lookin up to heaven askin where did we go wrong and tell me why forever got to be so long and be so strong but we all break down starin through the bars down a long hallway and theres no way out out of sight out of mind got me lookin at the world like they forgot about us
